field.name: summary
field.value: Change ResourceFileHandler to add HTTP cache headers

field.name: description
field.value:
Firefox and IE do not cache the JS files served by ResourceFileHandler. I confirmed this using Fiddler. I think this is due to the query string that is passed.
This patch changes ResourceFileHandler to emit caching headers so that the JS files are cached for 1 day. Perhaps the committer will want to change the caching parameters.

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: This was already fixed in r5109

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Reopened'' to ''Resolved''.
